医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示患有多囊卵巢综合症的中年女性的情绪化饮食风险情绪化饮食和不受控制的饮食在被诊断患有多囊卵巢综合症（PCOS）的中年女性中更为常见。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Study-reveals-emotional-eating-risks-in-middle-ged-women-with-PCOS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Study-reveals-emotional-eating-risks-in-middle-ged-women-with-PCOS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e56f323c-9fd3-45f0-a3ee-4dc354253376 Thu, 17 Oct 2024 10:04:03 -0400 Study reveals emotional eating risks in middle-aged women with PCOS
新的基因变异可以预测患者的严重溃疡性结肠炎腹痛、腹泻和令人虚弱的疲劳影响着全世界数百万慢性肠病患者的日常生活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/New-genic-variant-may-predict-severe-ulcerative-colitis-in-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/New-genic-variant-may-predict-severe-ulcerative-colitis-in-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39f02dc2-59be-4857-b996-236e79cce905 Thu, 17 Oct 2024 09:55:30 -0400 New genetic variant may predict severe ulcerative colitis in patients
乔治城大学获得 2750 万美元赠款用于海地抗击艾滋病毒/艾滋病美国疾病控制与预防中心 (CDC) 和总统艾滋病紧急救援计划 (PEPFAR) 已向乔治城大学医学中心的全球健康实践和影响中心 (CGHPI) 拨款 2750 万美元，以扩大其在以下领域正在进行的工作：海地应对艾滋病毒/艾滋病问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Georgetown-University-receives-24275-million-grant-to-combat-HIVAIDS-in-Haiti.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Georgetown-University-receives-24275-million-grant-to-combat-HIVAIDS-in-Haiti.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=420377de-0182-446d-b50a-b217de4069a5 Thu, 17 Oct 2024 09:23:54 -0400 Georgetown University receives $27.5 million grant to combat HIV/AIDS in Haiti
美国癌症检测在 COVID-19 的第一年严重中断，第二年恢复不完全JAMA 的一项研究发现，2020 年，COVID-19 导致癌症诊断数量减少了 127,931 例，2021 年的恢复情况受到人口和社区特征的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/US-cancer-detection-severely-disrupted-during-first-year-of-COVID-19-shows-incomplete-recovery-in-second-year。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/US-cancer-detection-severely-disrupted-during-first-year-of-COVID-19-shows-incomplete-recovery-in-second-year。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f43fe007-8956-44e0-b789-ee4844e1ba09 Thu, 17 Oct 2024 08:05:00 -0400 U.S. cancer detection severely disrupted during first year of COVID-19, shows incomplete recovery in second year
佛罗里达大学健康中心的科学家获得了对抗抗生素耐药细菌的巨额资助佛罗里达大学健康分校的科学家们正在探索抗生素组合如何对抗耐药细菌，他们获得了 1180 万美元的资助，这项工作可以帮助挽救每年因日益困扰人类的感染而丧生的数万人的生命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/UF-Health-scientists-receive-major-grant-to-combat-antibiotic-pressive-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/UF-Health-scientists-receive-major-grant-to-combat-antibiotic-pressive-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cbc06ead-60c3-4dc6-be9d-0e9cccf12941 Thu, 17 Oct 2024 07:21:35 -0400 UF Health scientists receive major grant to combat antibiotic-resistant bacteria
臭氧和类似药物可能会降低阿片类药物和酒精使用障碍的风险发表在科学杂志《成瘾》上的一项新研究发现，患有阿片类药物或酒精使用障碍（OUD、AUD）的人服用 Ozempic 或类似药物来治疗糖尿病/体重相关疾病，阿片类药物过量的发生率似乎降低了 40%，并且与不服用 Ozempic 或类似药物的 OUD 和 AUD 患者相比，酒精中毒率降低 50%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Ozempic-and-similar-drugs-may-lower-risks-for-opioid-and-alcohol-use-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Ozempic-and-similar-drugs-may-lower-risks-for-opioid-and-alcohol-use-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=448b7fd9-a6d7-4468-8f3f-b6c4bc76a621 Thu, 17 Oct 2024 07:17:46 -0400 Ozempic and similar drugs may lower risks for opioid and alcohol use disorders
失眠认知行为疗法与减少产后抑郁有关不列颠哥伦比亚大学 (UBC) 的新研究显示，怀孕期间进行的失眠认知行为疗法 (CBTI) 可以显着减轻母亲的产后抑郁症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Cognitive-behavioral-therapy-for-insomnia-linked-to-reduced-postpartum-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Cognitive-behavioral-therapy-for-insomnia-linked-to-reduced-postpartum-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9dac1071-04f3-462e-ade9-c49b259d7138 Thu, 17 Oct 2024 07:09:00 -0400 Cognitive behavioral therapy for insomnia linked to reduced postpartum depression
对老年中风幸存者服用苯二氮卓类药物的担忧日益增加尽管在过去十年中，老年人中苯二氮卓类药物（缓解焦虑、肌肉痉挛、产生镇静作用和减少癫痫发作的抑制剂）的处方量略有下降，但缺血后首次处方这些药物的比例（根据美国心脏协会下属的美国中风协会的同行评审科学杂志《中风》今天发表的研究，血栓引起的中风仍然相当大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Rising-concerns-over-苯二氮卓-prescriptions-in-older-中风-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Rising-concerns-over-苯二氮卓-prescriptions-in-older-中风-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6365f07b-459c-4bb7-928f-9eda0cd08e71 Thu, 17 Oct 2024 06:58:17 -0400 Rising concerns over benzodiazepine prescriptions in older stroke survivors
GLP1R 药物有望减少肥胖青少年的自杀意念使用 GLP1R 药物治疗肥胖症的青少年表现出较少的自杀念头，表明这些药物具有潜在的心理健康益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/GLP1R-medications-show-promise-in-reducing-suicidal-ideation-among-adolescents-with-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/GLP1R-medications-show-promise-in-reducing-suicidal-ideation-among-adolescents-with-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2f4e807-4e40-4830-838d-a4df649174b1 Thu, 17 Oct 2024 06:48:00 -0400 GLP1R medications show promise in reducing suicidal ideation among adolescents with obesity
患者依靠 Lyft 和 Uber 长途跋涉就医当 Lyft 司机 Tramaine Carr 将老年人和病人送往亚特兰大的医院时，她感觉自己既是朋友又是社会工作者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Patients-are-relying-on-Lyft-Uber-to-travel-far-distances-to-medical-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Patients-are-relying-on-Lyft-Uber-to-travel-far-distances-to-medical-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e44e9539-19f5-47b3-8087-8a4f39f9cab5 Thu, 17 Oct 2024 06:36:43 -0400 Patients are relying on Lyft, Uber to travel far distances to medical care
